title: Ashe Crit working?
body: As you can see about half of the shots are crits, got that in every game

replies.body: read what ashes passive says, then come again and EXPLAIN what exactly you mean
it says that i am suppose to allways crit with 110% dmg at the start, as you can clearly see about half the shots fired are crits

Thats Wrong, u only crit, if u applied ur passive before

So u only crit after an aa or a ability

oh ok, well mark this off cause i can clearly not read right :D
thank you for clearing this up for me, i was confused as hell
